RainbowPurifier_TC.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose !M! cards at most in hand, exhaust them.

Rafflesia_TC.NAME: Rafflesia
Rafflesia_TC.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! more cards at start of your turn.
Rafflesia_TC.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! more cards at start of your turn.

Bud_TC.NAME: Bud
Bud_TC.DESCRIPTION: thecolorful:Sprout. NL Add 1 *Retone to hand. NL thecolorful:Theme of [#33ee33]Green[] - thecolorful:Grow: *Rafflesia or *Rainbow *Flower.
Bud_TC.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: thecolorful:Sprout. NL Add 1 *Retone to hand. NL thecolorful:Theme of [#33ee33]Green[] - thecolorful:Grow: *Rafflesia+ or *Rainbow *Flower+.

MegaTree_TC.NAME: Mega Tree
MegaTree_TC.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. NL thecolorful:Theme of [#33ee33]Green[] - Deal damage equal to current block to a random enemy.
MegaTree_TC.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. NL thecolorful:Theme of [#ffff00]Yellow[], [#33ee33]Green[], [#0099ff]Blue[] - Deal damage equal to current block to a random enemy.

ThornsLayer_TC.NAME: Thorns Labyrinth
ThornsLayer_TC.DESCRIPTION: Gain 3 Thorns. NL Whenever you thecolorful:Tone to [#33ee33]Green[], gain !M! Thorns.
ThornsLayer_TC.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 3 Thorns. NL Whenever you thecolorful:Tone to [#33ee33]Green[], gain !M! Thorns.

Branch_TC.NAME: Branch
Branch_TC.DESCRIPTION: thecolorful:Sprout. NL Gain !B! Block 2 times. NL thecolorful:Theme of [#33ee33]Green[] - thecolorful:Grow: *Mega *Tree or *Thorns *Asylum.
Branch_TC.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: thecolorful:Sprout. NL Gain !B! Block 2 times. NL thecolorful:Theme of [#33ee33]Green[] - thecolorful:Grow: *Mega *Tree+ or *Thorns *Asylum+.

Leafgem_TC.NAME: Leafgem
Leafgem_TC.DESCRIPTION: thecolorful:Sprout. NL Add 1 *Retone to hand. NL thecolorful:Theme of [#ffff00]Yellow[], [#33ee33]Green[], [#0099ff]Blue[] - thecolorful:Grow: *Branch or *Bud.
Leafgem_TC.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: thecolorful:Sprout. NL Add 1 *Retone+ to hand. NL thecolorful:Theme of [#ffff00]Yellow[], [#33ee33]Green[], [#0099ff]Blue[] - thecolorful:Grow: *Branch+ or *Bud+.

PrairieBlaze_TC.NAME: Prairie Blaze
PrairieBlaze_TC.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you thecolorful:Tone to [#ff0000]Red[], gain !M! temporary Strength.
PrairieBlaze_TC.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you thecolorful:Tone to [#ff0000]Red[], gain !M! temporary Strength.

Nirvana_TC.NAME: Flame of Nirvana
Nirvana_TC.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust your hand and end your turn. Exhaust. NL thecolorful:Theme of [#ff0000]Red[] - Gain 1 max HP for each card exhausted, otherwise thecolorful:Tone to [#ff0000]Red[] and gain 1 Strength each.
Nirvana_TC.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust your hand and end your turn. Exhaust. NL thecolorful:Theme of [#ff0000]Red[] - Gain 1 max HP for each card exhausted, otherwise thecolorful:Tone to [#ff0000]Red[] and gain 1 Strength each.

Drill_TC.NAME: Drill
Drill_TC.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL thecolorful:Tone to [#ff0000]Red[]. NL If target is thecolorful:Painted, draw !M! card.
Drill_TC.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL thecolorful:Tone to [#ff0000]Red[]. NL If target is thecolorful:Painted, draw !M! cards.

Inspiration_TC.NAME: Inspiration
Inspiration_TC.DESCRIPTION: At start of your turn, choose from *Pause *Tone or *Retone and add 1 to your hand.
Inspiration_TC.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At start of your turn, choose from *Pause *Tone or *Retone and add 1 to your hand.

ScorchingSun_TC.NAME: Scorching Sun
ScorchingSun_TC.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust all colorless cards in hand, gain [E] for each card exhausted. NL thecolorful:Tone to [#ff9900]Orange[]. NL Exhaust.
ScorchingSun_TC.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust all colorless cards in hand, gain [E] for each card exhausted. NL thecolorful:Tone to [#ff9900]Orange[]. NL Exhaust.

GoldCraft_TC.NAME: Goldcraft
GoldCraft_TC.DESCRIPTION: thecolorful:Theme of [#ff9900]Orange[], [#ffff00]Yellow[], [#33ee33]Green[] - Gain 1 temporary Strength per colorless card in hand. Otherwise gain 2 block each and thecolorful:Tone to [#ffff00]Yellow[]. NL Exhaust.
GoldCraft_TC.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: thecolorful:Theme of [#ff9900]Orange[], [#ffff00]Yellow[], [#33ee33]Green[] - Gain 1 temporary Strength per colorless card in hand. Otherwise gain 2 block each and thecolorful:Tone to [#ffff00]Yellow[].

ShoalStrike_TC.NAME: Shoal Strike
ShoalStrike_TC.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL thecolorful:Theme of [#33ee33]Green[], [#0099ff]Blue[], [#cc33ff]Purple[] - Draw 1 card and put 1 card in hand on top of draw pile. Otherwise thecolorful:Tone to [#0099ff]Blue[].
ShoalStrike_TC.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL thecolorful:Theme of [#33ee33]Green[], [#0099ff]Blue[], [#cc33ff]Purple[] - Draw 1 card and put 1 card in hand on top of draw pile. Otherwise thecolorful:Tone to [#0099ff]Blue[].

TideWaves_TC.NAME: Tide Waves
TideWaves_TC.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. NL Scry 2. NL Draw !M! cards. NL thecolorful:Tone to [#0099ff]Blue[].
TideWaves_TC.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. NL Scry 2. NL Draw !M! cards. NL thecolorful:Tone to [#0099ff]Blue[].

Migrate_TC.NAME: Migrate
Migrate_TC.DESCRIPTION: Select !M! card in discard pile and put it on top of draw pile. NL Exhaust. NL thecolorful:Theme of [#33ee33]Green[], [#0099ff]Blue[], [#cc33ff]Purple[] - Avoid exhausting.
Migrate_TC.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Select !M! cards in discard pile and put them on top of draw pile in order. NL Exhaust. NL thecolorful:Theme of [#33ee33]Green[], [#0099ff]Blue[], [#cc33ff]Purple[] - Avoid exhausting.

GatheringClouds_TC.NAME: Gathering Clouds
GatheringClouds_TC.DESCRIPTION: Block will not be removed at start of your next turn. NL thecolorful:Theme of [#ff0000]Red[], [#ff9900]Orange[], [#ffff00]Yellow[] - Gain !M! block whenever you play a card this turn.
GatheringClouds_TC.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Block will not be removed at start of your next turn. NL thecolorful:Theme of [#ff0000]Red[], [#ff9900]Orange[], [#ffff00]Yellow[] - Gain !M! block whenever you play a card this turn.

Drizzle_TC.NAME: Drizzle
Drizzle_TC.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust. NL thecolorful:Theme of [#33ee33]Green[], [#0099ff]Blue[], [#cc33ff]Purple[] - Scry !M!. Otherwise thecolorful:Tone to [#0099ff]Blue[].
Drizzle_TC.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust. NL thecolorful:Theme of [#33ee33]Green[], [#0099ff]Blue[], [#cc33ff]Purple[] - Scry !M!. Otherwise thecolorful:Tone to [#0099ff]Blue[].

Draught_TC.NAME: Draught
Draught_TC.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL thecolorful:Theme of [#33ee33]Green[], [#0099ff]Blue[], [#cc33ff]Purple[] - Apply !M! Weak and Vulnerable to ALL enemies.
Draught_TC.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL thecolorful:Theme of [#33ee33]Green[], [#0099ff]Blue[], [#cc33ff]Purple[] - Apply !M! Weak and Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

RogueWave_TC.NAME: Rogue Wave
RogueWave_TC.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add 1 *Retone to hand. NL thecolorful:Theme of [#33ee33]Green[], [#0099ff]Blue[], [#cc33ff]Purple[] - Retain your hand this turn.
RogueWave_TC.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add 1 *Retone+ to hand. NL thecolorful:Theme of [#33ee33]Green[], [#0099ff]Blue[], [#cc33ff]Purple[] - Retain your hand this turn.

FrostBite_TC.NAME: Frostbite
FrostBite_TC.DESCRIPTION: thecolorful:Theme of [#33ee33]Green[], [#0099ff]Blue[], [#cc33ff]Purple[] - Draw 1 more card next turn for each card in hand. Otherwise thecolorful:Tone to [#0099ff]Blue[] and make a random enemy lose !D! HP for each card in hand.
FrostBite_TC.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: thecolorful:Theme of [#33ee33]Green[], [#0099ff]Blue[], [#cc33ff]Purple[] - Draw 1 more card next turn for each card in hand. Otherwise thecolorful:Tone to [#0099ff]Blue[] and make a random enemy lose !D! HP for each card in hand.

ImperfectGlacialist_TC.NAME: Imperfect Glacialist
ImperfectGlacialist_TC.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL thecolorful:Tone to [#0099ff]Blue[]. NL Increase damage by actual damage dealt after each play.
ImperfectGlacialist_TC.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Deal !D! damage. NL thecolorful:Tone to [#0099ff]Blue[]. NL Increase damage by actual damage dealt after each play.

Tundra_TC.NAME: Tundra
Tundra_TC.DESCRIPTION: thecolorful:Field. NL thecolorful:Theme of [#33ee33]Green[], [#0099ff]Blue[], [#cc33ff]Purple[] at end of your turn - put !M! cards in discard pile on top of deaw pile. Otherwise Scry !M! and thecolorful:Tone to [#0099ff]Blue[].
Tundra_TC.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. thecolorful:Field. NL thecolorful:Theme of [#33ee33]Green[], [#0099ff]Blue[], [#cc33ff]Purple[] at end of your turn - put !M! cards in discard pile on top of deaw pile. Otherwise Scry !M! and thecolorful:Tone to [#0099ff]Blue[].

Storm_TC.NAME: Storm
Storm_TC.DESCRIPTION: thecolorful:Theme of [#33ee33]Green[], [#0099ff]Blue[], [#cc33ff]Purple[] - Gain !M! block whenever you draw a card manually.
Storm_TC.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: thecolorful:Theme of [#33ee33]Green[], [#0099ff]Blue[], [#cc33ff]Purple[] - Gain !M! block whenever you draw a card manually.

Stream_TC.NAME: Stream
Stream_TC.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL thecolorful:Theme of [#0099ff]Blue[] - reduce cost of this card to 1 in remaining battle. NL Otherwise thecolorful:Tone to [#0099ff]Blue[].
Stream_TC.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL thecolorful:Theme of [#0099ff]Blue[] - reduce cost of this card to 1 in remaining battle. NL Otherwise thecolorful:Tone to [#0099ff]Blue[].

TigerShark_TC.NAME: Tigershark
TigerShark_TC.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Randomly deal !D! ~ 100 damage. NL thecolorful:Tone to [#0099ff]Blue[]. Increase lower bound for !M! for each card in hand.
TigerShark_TC.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Randomly deal !D! ~ 100 damage. NL thecolorful:Tone to [#0099ff]Blue[]. Increase lower bound for !M! for each card in hand.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Randomly deal !D! ~ 100 damage. NL thecolorful:Tone to [#0099ff]Blue[]. Deal !M! damage more for each card in hand.

SpringTide_TC.NAME: Rising Tide
SpringTide_TC.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Discard your hand and draw equal amount of cards. NL Gain 1 Strength or 1 Dexterity randomly for each card discarded.
SpringTide_TC.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Discard your hand and draw equal amount of cards. NL Gain 1 Strength or 1 Dexterity randomly for each card discarded.

Avalanche_TC.NAME: Avalanche
Avalanche_TC.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! X block. NL Draw X more cards at start of next turn.
Avalanche_TC.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! (X+1) block. NL Draw (X+1) more cards at start of next turn.

Current_TC.NAME: Current
Current_TC.DESCRIPTION: Put 1 card in draw pile to hand. Exhaust.
Current_TC.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Put 1 card in draw pile to hand.

PrimaryArmaBlue_TC.NAME: Primary Arma - Blue

Enlightning_TC.NAME: Inazuma
Enlightning_TC.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable unless thecolorful:Theme being [#cc33ff]Purple[]. NL Deal !M!x sum amount of all debuff present to ALL enemies.
Enlightning_TC.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable unless thecolorful:Theme being [#cc33ff]Purple[]. NL Deal !M!x sum amount of all buff and debuff present to ALL enemies.

VineWhip_TC.NAME: Vine Whip
VineWhip_TC.DESCRIPTION: thecolorful:Sprout. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL thecolorful:Theme of [#ffff00]Yellow[], [#33ee33]Green[], [#0099ff]Blue[] - thecolorful:Grow: *Long *Vine. NL Otherwise thecolorful:Tone to [#33ee33]Green[].

BirdsStrike_TC.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times randomly. NL thecolorful:Theme of [#ff0000]Red[], [#ff9900]Orange[], [#ffff00]Yellow[] - Gain [E] . Otherwise thecolorful:Tone to [#ff9900]Orange[].

WashBucket_TC.NAME: Wash Bucket

Iridescence_TC.NAME: Iridescence

MountainsHeart_TC.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gain Strength, gain 1 Regen. NL The power can stack !M! Regen at most.

Creation_TC.NAME: Creation

ConstructForm_TC.NAME: Construct Form

ConstructForm_TC.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At start of your turn, select !M! card from your discard pile and move it to your hand.

RosyClouds_TC.DESCRIPTION: thecolorful:Field. NL thecolorful:Theme of [#ff0000]Red[], [#ff9900]Orange[], [#ffff00]Yellow[] at start of turn - Gain [E] . Otherwise thecolorful:Tone to [#ff9900]Orange[].

Wilderness_TC.NAME: Wilderness
Wilderness_TC.DESCRIPTION: thecolorful:Field. NL thecolorful:Theme of [#ffff00]Yellow[], [#33ee33]Green[], [#0099ff]Blue[] at start of turn - Draw !M! more cards. Otherwise thecolorful:Tone to [#33ee33]Green[] and gain !M! *Plated *Armor.

SunriseVariine_TC.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL All enemies lose !M! (X+1) HP. NL Gain X [E] .

MeridiemChords_TC.NAME: Meridiem
MeridiemChords_TC.DESCRIPTION: Apply thecolorful:Painted. NL Gain [E] [E] . NL Exhaust.

Foehn_TC.NAME: Foehn

LeavesHail_TC.DESCRIPTION: thecolorful:Sprout. Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL thecolorful:Theme of [#33ee33]Green[] - Upgrade this card in this battle. NL Can be upgraded multiple times.

Blendin_TC.NAME: Blend in
Blendin_TC.DESCRIPTION: If you do not lose any HP in this turn, reduce the next !M! damages you receive to 0 from start of next turn.
Blendin_TC.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: If you do not lose any HP in this turn, reduce the next !M! damages you receive to 0 from start of next turn.

ProfusionSprout_TC.NAME: Emerge into Seed
ProfusionSprout_TC.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle a random thecolorful:Sprout into draw pile.
ProfusionSprout_TC.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Shuffle a random upgraded thecolorful:Sprout into draw pile.

Profusion_TC.NAME: Profusion
Profusion_TC.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Heal 5% max HP upon drawn. NL *Choose: Gain 1 thecolorful:Ink charge, or shuffle a random thecolorful:Sprout into draw pile. NL If present in hand at end of turn, shuffle a replica into draw pile.

Overgrow_TC.NAME: Overgrow
